pr_title: Fix documentation which recommends to use unofficial gRPC web client

timeline.message:
Fix documentation which recommends to use unoficial gRPC web client
We haven't supported grpc-web-text so we recommended to use unofficial gRPC web client
,which supports grpc-web-json, to communicate with Armeria server.
Now, because we support both grpc-web-text and grpc-web-json, we don't have to recommend the unofficial client.

timeline.bodyText: or link to the documentation site? https://grpc.io/docs/languages/web/quickstart/
timeline.author: ikhoon
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -271,6 +271,6 @@ For more information, see the official [gRPC Server Reflection tutorial](https:/
 
 [gRPC]: https://grpc.io/
 [gRPC-Web]: https://github.com/grpc/grpc/blob/master/doc/PROTOCOL-WEB.md
-[gRPC-Web-Client]: https://github.com/improbable-eng/grpc-web
+[gRPC-Web-Client]: https://github.com/grpc/grpc-node/tree/master/packages/grpc-js
